HOW IT WORKS

Step 1: REGISTER AN ACCOUNT

Register an account, complete your profile by adding a profile Picture and verify your email and phone number.

Step 2: POST A PROPERTY

A property with images and a clear description catches tenants and buyers' attention.

Step 3: CHAT - GET IN TOUCH

Chat with client who will message you when interested in your property. Agree on the terms and conditions

Step 4: CLOSE THE DEAL

Receive payments through our secure system and this will always be recorded to ensure proper bills management of the property

Step 1: REGISTER AN ACCOUNT

Register an account, complete your profile by adding a profile Picture and verify your email and phone number.

Step 2: VIEW OR SEARCH FOR A PROPERTY

Check through the posted properties or search through the largest, secure and trusted property database.

Step 3: OR FIND PROPERTIES BY LOCATIONS

Interested in a property? Chat with the owner directly with no third-parties. Agree on all the terms and conditions.

Step 4: CHAT - GET IN TOUCH

Interested in a property? Chat with the owner directly with no third-parties. Agree on all the terms and conditions.

Step 4: CLOSE THE DEAL

Pay through our secure system and this will help you keep records of your payments. You will always see your payments and balances in the dashboad
